title: Equipment Redeployment and Reset
description: A logistics planner must plan the redeployment of a unit's equipment from a theater of operations back to its home base for maintenance and reset.

tasks.description: Inventory all equipment to be redeployed, noting its current condition.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner creates a complete inventory with maintenance status for each item.

tasks.description: Schedule strategic transport (e.g., cargo ships) for the return journey.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner books the necessary transport to move all equipment.

tasks.description: Coordinate with the home base depot to schedule the maintenance and repair for the returning equipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner successfully schedules the 'reset' phase for the unit's equipment.
